activities: Lume provides managed hosting, colocation and data storage solutions.  Lume collects personal information from prospective customers, prospective employees, prospective vendors and other persons located in the European Union who may be interested in a business relationship with Lume via website visits, phone calls, chats, emails, web forms, written correspondence, third party providers or other means.  Lume uses this information to contact those persons about Lume services, employment opportunities potential business transactions and to generally improve the way Lume markets its services.  When doing so, Lume adheres to the protection principles of the Safe Harbor framework.  Lume may also provide unmanaged services, and does not control or determine the types of data stored on its infrastructure. In these cases, Lume's customers are responsible for compliance with the data protection principles of the European Union.
corpofftitle1: Director of Marketing and Corp. Secretary
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
